Sentence.sentence: The final legislation might throw a public plan into the competition, but thanks to the fierce opposition of the insurance industry and Republican critics, it might not save much money.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We've held on to this workday structure – but thanks to our digital devices, many employees never really clock  out.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And to those students who protest this tough-love teaching style: you'll thank me later.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Same goes for surgeons, who're using robotic systems to perform an ever-growing list of operations-not because the machines save money but because, thanks to the greater precision of robots, the patients recover in less time and have fewer complications, says Dr. Myriam Curet.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That may be because they have had plenty of younger ones to choose from, partly thanks to the post-war baby-boom and partly because over the past few decades many more women have entered the labour force, increasing employers' choice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And that box there to confirm you have known driving convictions, thank you, and then sign there.

Sentence.sentence: Thank goodness, David pulled us out of the hole on that one.

Sentence.sentence: To thank them for their hospitality.

Sentence.sentence: Oh, thanks for the invitation, but this is how I relax.

Sentence.sentence: Ask Tony to convey thanks to his mother.

Sentence.sentence: Thank you, but I don't eat shellfish.

Sentence.sentence: For the rest of us, however, our hearty lower-tiered universities are just fine, thank you.

Sentence.sentence: Thank you for calling SAKS Fifth Avenue Department Store.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: After receiving the Oscar for Best Supporting Actress, Anne Benedict went on to thank all the people who had helped in her career.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Anyone who has ever been helped by a social worker has Jane Addams to thank.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Asked if he needs help, he replies, " no, thanks."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But before I go, I'd like to invite you out for dinner — just to thank you for all the help you gave me during my three-month research work here.

Sentence.sentence: By the end of the century, if not sooner, the world's oceans will be bluer and greener thanks to a warming climate, according to a new study.

Sentence.sentence: Good luck! And thanks for coming in today.

Sentence.sentence: In the past two decades, however, continued connection with and dependence on family,thanks to cellphones,email and social media, have increased significantly.

责怪；由…负责；多亏；归功于

phrase.cizu_name: I will thank you to do something

jx.jx_en_mean: used to make a request or command and implying a reproach or annoyance
jx.jx_cn_mean: （表责备、生气时的请求）拜托，请

lj.lj_ly: I'll thank you not to interrupt me again.

phrase.cizu_name: thank goodness (或 God 或 heavens)

lj.lj_ly: thank goodness no one was badly injured.

jx.jx_en_mean: feel grateful for one's good fortune
jx.jx_cn_mean: 感谢自己的好运气，自庆幸运

entry.def: You use thank you or, in more informal English, thanks to express your gratitude when someone does something for you or gives you what you want.

example.ex: Thank you very much for your call...

entry.def: You use thank you or, in more informal English, thanks to politely accept or refuse something that has just been offered to you.
entry.tran: 谢谢你，多谢(用于有礼貌地接受或拒绝)

example.ex: 'You'd like a cup as well, would you, Mr Secombe?' — 'Thank you, Jane, I'd love one.'...
example.tran: “塞科姆先生，你也想来一杯吧？”——“谢谢，简，我确实想来一杯。”

example.ex: 'Would you like a cigarette?' — 'No thank you.'...

entry.def: You use thank you or, in more informal English, thanks to politely acknowledge what someone has said to you, especially when they have answered your question or said something nice to you.
entry.tran: 谢谢你，多谢(尤用于礼貌地感谢对方的回答或所说的令人开心的话)

example.ex: The policeman smiled at her. 'Pretty dog.' — 'Oh well, thank you.'...
example.tran: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

example.ex: 'His eyes were glassy?' — 'And dilated. They were watery.' — 'Thank you.'...
example.tran: “他的眼神呆滞？”——“还双眼圆睁，泪汪汪的。”——“谢谢！”

entry.def: You use thank you or thank you very much in order to say firmly that you do not want someone's help or to tell them that you do not like the way that they are behaving towards you.
entry.tran: 谢谢，非常感谢(用于坚决回绝别人的帮助或表示不喜欢别人的举动)

example.ex: I can stir my own tea, thank you...
example.tran: 我的茶我自己会搅，谢谢。

example.ex: We know where we can get it, thank you very much.
example.tran: 我们知道在哪儿能买到，谢谢。

entry.def: When you thank someone for something, you express your gratitude to them for it.

example.ex: I thanked them for their long and loyal service...
example.tran: 我感谢他们长期以来忠诚的效力。

example.ex: When the decision was read out Mrs Gardner thanked the judges.
example.tran: 判决书宣读完，加德纳夫人向法官们表示感谢。

entry.def: When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something.

example.ex: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
example.tran: 他们一边道谢，一边接过证书。

entry.def: When people give thanks, they thank God for something good that has happened.

example.ex: We give thanks for this food.
example.tran: 感谢上帝赐给我们食物。

entry.def: You say 'Thank God', 'Thank Goodness', or 'Thank heavens' when you are very relieved about something.

example.ex: Thank heavens we have you here.
example.tran: 谢天谢地，我们可等到你了。

entry.def: If you say that you have someone to thank for something, you mean that you are grateful to them because they caused it to happen.

example.ex: I have her to thank for my life...
For all this I have only you to thank.
example.tran: 这一切我都得感谢你才是。

entry.def: If you say that something happens thanks to a particular person or thing, you mean that they are responsible for it happening or caused it to happen.

example.ex: It is thanks to this committee that many new sponsors have come forward...
example.tran: 又有许多赞助商找上门来，这要归功于这个委员会。

example.ex: Thanks to recent research, effective treatments are available.
example.tran: 多亏近来的研究才有了有效的疗法。

entry.def: If you say that something happens no thanks to a particular person or thing, you mean that they did not help it to happen, or that it happened in spite of them.
entry.tran: 并非由于…才(发生);并不归功于

example.ex: It is no thanks to the Government that net assets did rise.
example.tran: 净资产的确增长了，但这与政府无关。

means.word_mean: 1. express gratitude or show appreciation to

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thancian, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German danken; compare with thanks

sentences.cn: （53）达尔文写这封信是为了要感谢美国的地质学家费迪南德•范迪维尔•海登博士，感谢海登把他自己对一个区域所做的地质研究的副本寄给了他，该地区也就是后来的黄石国家公园。
sentences.en: The letter was written by Darwin to thank an American geologist, Dr.Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden, for sending him copies of his research into the geology of the region that would become Yellowstone National Park.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 男： 好的， 非常感谢你，Helen。
sentences.en: M: OK, thank you very much, ?Helen.

sentences.cn: 女：多么精彩的故事！非常感谢。

sentences.cn: 我们感谢中国政府主办此次会议,并真诚地关注中东和平事业.
sentences.en: We thank Chinese government joint delegation and for its sincere interest in our cause.

sentences.en: Thanks advance for your reply.

sentences.cn: 感谢您一直以来对我们的支持.
sentences.en: First , Thanks for all your support Grammy.

sentences.cn: 多么可笑的气话, 我是在帮你们, 取缔所有的黄金农民, 你们应该感谢我!
sentences.en: LOL , how ridiculous gas, I am helping you, banning all gold farmers, you should thank me!

sentences.cn: B非常感谢. 我们能再要一些米饭 吗 ?
sentences.en: B Thank you very much. And can we have some more rice, please ?

sentences.cn: 因此我感谢永生的众神.
sentences.en: For that I return thanks to the immortal gods.

sentences.cn: 谨先 向您表示感谢.
sentences.en: We thank you in anticipation ( advance ).

sentences.cn: 衷心感谢您,我孩子的恩师.

sentences.cn: 感谢奥美足球队员,以及所有支持球赛的的奥美啦啦队员们!
sentences.en: Thanks to our soccer players and cheer team ! Let's cheer them on!

sentences.cn: 在此, 向给予我们支持、鼓励的各界朋友表示感谢!
sentences.en: Herein, our club acknowledges great thanks to each friend bestows support and encouragement to us.

sentences.cn: 他们责怪政府最近的石油价格上涨.
sentences.en: They had the government to thank for the latest rise in oil prices.

sentences.cn: 她勉为其难地说出了几句道谢的话.
sentences.en: She managed to get out a few words of thanks.

sentences.cn: 临走时,他很粗鲁地打断了那父亲的紧张的道谢的话.
sentences.en: When he left he cut short the father's nervous thanks gruffly.

Sentence.sentence: It didn't take long for magazines and documentary film-makers to come to understand her total recall, and thanks to the subsequent media interest, a few dozen other subjects ( ' , including Veiseh) have since come forward and contacted the team at the University of California, Irvine.

Sentence.sentence: In some ways, you probably go through that process after a big event like your wedding day – but the difference is that thanks to their other psychological tendencies, the HSAM subjects are doing it day in, day out, for the whole of their lives.

Sentence.sentence: Brits stayed up a half-hour later to watch it, and then they woke up earlier than usual the next morning thanks to summer nights, the phenomenon in which the sun barely sets in northern countries in the summertime.
